description:
A Fisherman’s is given a gift that turns about to be a curse,  monkeys worship a Buddha without getting their butts wet, and a merchant learns what is important in life.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Urashima Tarou / Saru Jizou / Takara Kurabe
Urashima Tarou / The Monkey Buddha / Comparing Treasures
浦島太郎 / 猿地蔵 / 宝くらべ
